mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_APPUSER_PAYMENT ( GOLD, USERID, CREATE_TIME, DOLLID, COST_TYPE, REMARK )VALUES ( #{GOLD}, #{USERID}, now(), #{DOLLID}, #{COST_TYPE}, #{REMARK} )
mapper.select:
select p.ID, p.USERID, p.GOLD, p.COST_TYPE, p.CREATE_TIME, p.REMARK, u.NICKNAME, u.NAME from TB_APPUSER_PAYMENT p left join sys_app_user u on u.USER_ID=p.USERID
where 1=1
and p.CREATE_TIME >= str_to_date(#{pd.lastStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and p.CREATE_TIME <= str_to_date(#{pd.lastEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and ( u.CNEE_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') or u.NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') )
and p.COST_TYPE = #{pd.COST_TYPE}
ORDER BY P.CREATE_TIME desc

select
o.REC_ID, o.ORDER_ID, o.CREATETIME, o.REGMODE, o.REGAMOUNT, o.`STATUS`, u.NICKNAME, u.NAME from sys_app_order o left join sys_app_user u on u.USER_ID=o.USER_ID
where 1=1
and o.CREATETIME >= str_to_date(#{pd.lastStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and o.CREATETIME <= str_to_date(#{pd.lastEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and ( u.CNEE_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') or u.NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.keywords}),'%') )
and o.`STATUS` = #{pd.STATUS}
ORDER BY o.CREATETIME desc
select ID, DOLLID, GOLD, USERID, COST_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, REMARK, UPDATE_TIME from tb_appuser_payment where userid = #{USERID} order by create_time desc ;

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') as CREATE_TIME, COUNT(1) as COUNT FROM TB_APPUSER_PAYMENT t where t.COST_TYPE='5'
and date_format(t.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') >= str_to_date(#{lastStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and date_format(t.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{lastEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY date_format(t.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY date_format(t.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') as CREATE_TIME, COUNT(1) as COUNT FROM TB_APPUSER_PAYMENT t where (t.COST_TYPE='0' or t.COST_TYPE='1')
and date_format(t.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') >= str_to_date(#{lastStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
AND date_format(t.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{lastEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
GROUP BY date_format(t.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY date_format(t.CREATE_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT SUM(REGAMOUNT) as money , CREATETIME FROM sys_app_order WHERE `STATUS`=1
and CREATETIME >= str_to_date(#{pd.lastStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and CREATETIME <= str_to_date(#{pd.lastEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')

SELECT s1.CREATETIME, IFNULL(s1.ALLREGAMOUNT,0)/100 AS ALLREGAMOUNT, IFNULL(s1.ALLCOUNT,0) as ALLCOUNT, IFNULL(s2.SUCREGAMOUNT,0)/100 as SUCREGAMOUNT, IFNULL(s2.SUCCOUNT,0) as SUCCOUNT, IFNULL(s3.FAILREGAMOUNT,0)/100 as FAILREGAMOUNT, IFNULL(s3.FAILCOUNT,0) as FAILCOUNT FROM ( SELECT date_format(a1.CREATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') as CREATETIME, SUM(a1.REGAMOUNT) as ALLREGAMOUNT, COUNT(1) as ALLCOUNT from sys_app_order a1 GROUP BY date_format(a1.CREATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') ) s1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT
date_format( a2.CREATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') as CREATETIME, SUM(a2.REGAMOUNT) as SUCREGAMOUNT, COUNT(1) as SUCCOUNT from sys_app_order a2 WHERE a2.`STATUS`='1' GROUP BY date_format(a2.CREATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') ) s2 on s2.CREATETIME= s1.CREATETIME LEFT JOIN ( SELECT date_format( a3.CREATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') as CREATETIME, SUM(a3.REGAMOUNT) as FAILREGAMOUNT, COUNT(1) as FAILCOUNT from sys_app_order a3 WHERE a3.`STATUS`='0' GROUP BY date_format(a3.CREATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') ) s3 on s3.CREATETIME= s1.CREATETIME
WHERE 1=1
and s1.CREATETIME >= str_to_date(#{pd.lastStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and s1.CREATETIME <= str_to_date(#{pd.lastEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY s1.CREATETIME DESC

SELECT s1.CREATETIME, s1.dateTime, IFNULL(s1.ALLREGAMOUNT,0)/100 AS ALLREGAMOUNT, IFNULL(s1.ALLCOUNT,0) as ALLCOUNT, IFNULL(s2.SUCREGAMOUNT,0)/100 as SUCREGAMOUNT, IFNULL(s2.SUCCOUNT,0) as SUCCOUNT, IFNULL(s3.FAILREGAMOUNT,0)/100 as FAILREGAMOUNT, IFNULL(s3.FAILCOUNT,0) as FAILCOUNT FROM ( SELECT MONTH(a1.CREATETIME) as CREATETIME,YEAR(a1.CREATETIME) as dateTime, SUM(a1.REGAMOUNT) as ALLREGAMOUNT, COUNT(1) as ALLCOUNT from sys_app_order a1 GROUP BY MONTH(a1.CREATETIME) ) s1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT
MONTH( a2.CREATETIME) as CREATETIME, YEAR(a2.CREATETIME) as dateTime, SUM(a2.REGAMOUNT) as SUCREGAMOUNT, COUNT(1) as SUCCOUNT from sys_app_order a2 WHERE a2.`STATUS`='1' GROUP BY MONTH(a2.CREATETIME) ) s2 on s2.CREATETIME= s1.CREATETIME LEFT JOIN ( SELECT MONTH( a3.CREATETIME) as CREATETIME,YEAR(a3.CREATETIME) as dateTime, SUM(a3.REGAMOUNT) as FAILREGAMOUNT, COUNT(1) as FAILCOUNT from sys_app_order a3 WHERE a3.`STATUS`='0' GROUP BY MONTH(a3.CREATETIME) ) s3 on s3.CREATETIME= s1.CREATETIME
WHERE 1=1
and s1.CREATETIME >= str_to_date(#{pd.lastStart}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and s1.CREATETIME <= str_to_date(#{pd.lastEnd}, '%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY MONTH(s1.CREATETIME)
